content.content:
You are given three images, one is called target and the other two are distractors.
Your task is to generate a referring expression that best describes the target image while distinguishing it from the two other distractor images.
The first image is a distractor, the second image is the target, and the third image is a distractor. Instruction: Describe the target image. Generate the referring expression starting with the tag "Expression: " for the given target image. Omit any other text.

action.content:
<start of description>
The target image displays a modern living room with a neutral color palette. The room features a large, cream-colored sectional sofa facing a flat-screen television mounted on a stone-clad fireplace. To the left of the television, there's a built-in bookshelf with various decorative items. The floor is covered with a patterned area rug, and the walls are painted in a light, warm hue. A staircase with a white balustrade and black handrail leads to an upper level. The room is well-lit with natural light from large windows, and the overall aesthetic is one of understated elegance and comfort. There are no distracting elements, making the living room the focal point of the image.
<end of

action.original_content:
<start of description>
The target image displays a modern living room with a neutral color palette. The room features a large, cream-colored sectional sofa facing a flat-screen television mounted on a stone-clad fireplace. To the left of the television, there's a built-in bookshelf with various decorative items. The floor is covered with a patterned area rug, and the walls are painted in a light, warm hue. A staircase with a white balustrade and black handrail leads to an upper level. The room is well-lit with natural light from large windows, and the overall aesthetic is one of understated elegance and comfort. There are no distracting elements, making the living room the focal point of the image.
<end of
